title: Leny Andrade, Brazilian singer with jazz soul, dies at 80
description: Ms. Andrade helped create a new sound as she fused Brazil's mellow bossa nova with jazz-influenced improvisations.

title: ‘Monster hunters’ needed for biggest Loch Ness search in 50 years
description: The Loch Ness Centre in Scotland is calling for "a new generation of monsters" to stage a lake-wide search for Nessie, the mythical Loch Ness monster, this month.

title: Imran Khan arrested after jail sentence on corruption charges, party says
description: The arrest of Pakistan's opposition leader and former prime minister Imran Khan comes days before the government is expected to pave the way for a general election.

title: Thousands of teens to evacuate from World Scout Jamboree amid heat wave
description: U.S., British and Singaporean Scouts will leave the mass camp site in South Korea after nearly 1,500 people received medical treatment for illness and injury.

title: In Lebanon’s south, on the Israel border, new tension stirs old fears
description: Residents feel they are at the mercy of events beyond their control, including provocations by Hezbollah and clashes inside Israel, fearing they could spark a conflict.

title: Ukraine live briefing: Tanker hit near Crimea, Russia says; Kyiv claims strike on Russian warship
description: The attack on a tanker in the Kerch Strait, reported by Russia’s water transport agency, comes after Ukraine said it damaged a warship in Moscow’s Black Sea Fleet.
